notifications.ring-list-saved: Your Dynamic Ring List has been updated, reload to see the new rings

first-time-user.content:
Welcome to SETT

Hi, welcome to the module.

To access new token rings you need to navigate to your game settings and there should be a new button in the settings above the selection for Dynamic Token Ring where you can select a token rings to enable.

After that you'll be prompted to restart the foundry, and the new ring will show up in your list of options

1.title: Navigate To
1.content: After opening settings first navigate from into 'Core' settings

2.title: SETT Menu
2.content: You should see the SETT button that has been inserted, use this to enable new rings!

3.title: After that
3.content: After you have enabled rings make sure to click save, then you'll eb prompted to reload foundry

4.title: Selecting a Ring
4.content: Select a Ring here, it will prompt you to reload so that it can update the rings

5.title: Thanks
5.content: Thanks for taking the tour, make sure to tip your tour guide (me) and your servers (Ring Makers) on you way out if you feel so inclined :P.
